 The Init packet file (*.dat) should contain the device type and revision, application version, list of supported Soft Devices and the firmware CRC in binary format or, with old versions of the DFU bootloader, only the CRC (CRC-CCITT-16). With the new version of the bootloader the extended Init packet is required. OK (Init file selected) Reading file failed n/a Select device: Cancel Scan File browser application has not been found on your device. Would you like to download one?

Application Uploading Are you sure to cancel upload? Permission required AVAILABLE DEVICES: BONDED DEVICES: No device found Starting from nRF Toolbox v1.12 the new Distribution packet (ZIP) is the recommended method for distributing firmware upgrades. You can create the ZIP file using the nrf utility tool, which is part of Master Control Panel 3.8.0+. For more detailed information, see the DFU documentation. 

Backward compatibility 
The nRF Toolbox also supports all old file formats: HEX and BIN files, separate DAT files and ZIP files without a manifest file but with a fixed naming convention:
Example HEX files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor. New example HEX files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor. DFU script files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor. Since Android 6.0 Marshmallow system requires granting access to device's location in order to scan for Bluetooth Smart devices. Bluetooth beacons may be used to determine the phone's and user's location. Please, select valid HEX file About Settings 

Version: %s About The Device Firmware Update (DFU) app allows you to update the firmware of your Bluetooth Smart device over-the-air (OTA). It is compatible with Nordic Semiconductor nRF51822 or nRF51422 devices with S110 SoftDevice and DFU bootloader enabled. With SoftDevice s110 7.0.0+, the SoftDevice itself and/or a bootloader may also be updated. 

For more information about the DFU, see the About DFU section in Settings. Web Browser application is not available. During a DFU operation a lot of data packets are being sent to the target. The onCharacteristicWrite(...) callback in Android API is invoked when the data has been written to the outgoing queue, not when physically sent. Packet receipt notifications were introduced to prevent from overflowing the queue. Depending on the device model, disabling the notifications or setting the value to “high” (> ~300) may make the DFU process freeze at some point. Information Check this switch to ON if you want to perform a DFU operation without jumping to the bootloader mode on a device with a DFU implementation from SDK 6.1 or older. To achieve the same result on any newer implementation the DFU Version characteristic should return value other than 0x0100. DFU options Packets receipt notification procedure Number of packets MBR size (4096 on nRF51, 12288 on nRF52) MBR size DEVICE FIRMWARE UPDATE Keep bond information External MCU DFU DFU documentation on Nordic's Developer Zone About DFU Template Settings APPLICATION DEVICE FIRMWARE UPDATE Done Select file A file browser application must be installed on the device before selecting the file. 

There are number of applications available on Google Play store, e.g. Total Commander or File Manager, that allow you to pick a file from internal memory of the device. To upload a file from the Internet you may use f.e. Drive or Dropbox application. 

You will be asked to select an application if more than one is installed. A single application will be launched automatically. 

Since Android KitKat you may use the preinstalled document picker application. Ensure Display advanced devices option is enabled in settings to use the Internal storage. 

Sample applications were copied to Nordic Semiconductor folder in the internal storage. DFU BLE Device List Deocoder CWM-Tools WEARABLE 個資設定 目標設定 手環設定 分析 智能應用 StorageBoxActivity 一個 USB 充電線與手環

手還能防潑水，雨淋以及洗澡，但是請避免戴著泡湯或游泳。
點選手環螢幕左下方能畫面瀏覽。
